{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R6100 |revision=v1 |series=AC1200 |upc=606449098082 |asin=B00D78Q2AO |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |est_release_date=06/17/2013 |fcc_date=05/10/2013 |fcc_id=PY312400225 |ic_id=4054A-12400225 |pcb_id=2976443403 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344;AR9344-BC2A; |cpu1_cspeed=560 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F1G08ABADA |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344;AR9344-BC2A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9882;QCA9882-2R4E; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags=DFS |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;dni29 V0.9; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31;OpenWrt-deriv; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NETGEARXX, NETGEARXX-5G |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$,,, ^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}-5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=44:94:FC |oui_eth=44:94:FC }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 WiFi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R6100.aspx}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R6100}} "2976443403" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :{{WiFiCert|WFA50269|09/09/2013}} This FCC ID covers the R6000 and the R6100. Per the FCC test report... *The R6000 is 2x2 on the 2.4GHz band and 1x1 on the 5GHz band *The R6100 is 2x2 on the 2.4GHz band and 2x2 on the 5GHz band :The FCC operational description states ''the device'' uses AR9334 :(per the photos, AR9344-BC2A) and QCA9880 (QCA9882-2R4E). :Both devices are assumed to use the same ''[[QCA]]'' 5GHz radio. The default SSID patterns are presumed to be '''NETGEARXX''' and '''NETGEARXX-5G'''. ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32167-netgear-r6100-wifi-router-ac1200-dual-band-reviewed ''Netgear R6100'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (P/N info is per SNB) :''[[Delta Networks]]'' is the manufacturer ("2976443403" is silkscreened on the board) :The 5GHz radio is also specified as using three [[SiGe]] SE5003L power amplfiers :'''NETGEARXX''' + '''NETGEARXX-5G''' SSIDs shown in the UI screenshots, 44:94:FC OUI
